positions.subtitle: A.P. Moller - Maersk
positions.description: * Accountable for successful delivery of assigned projects as per scope & margins within agreed timelines* Drive project execution: track project activities, supervise and handle changes, conflicts and critical issues * Handle customer and partner engagement: manage customer relationship building confidence and trust* Project Documentations: evaluate project requirements, identify and resolve ambiguities, and build all required documentation including scope statements, project timeline, risk mitigation plans, issue logs, status and cost reports to be presented to internal and external stakeholders.
positions.title: Customer Implementation Specialist
positions.description_html:
* Accountable for successful delivery of assigned projects as per scope & margins within agreed timelines
* Drive project execution: track project activities, supervise and handle changes, conflicts and critical issues
* Handle customer and partner engagement: manage customer relationship building confidence and trust
* Project Documentations: evaluate project requirements, identify and resolve ambiguities, and build all required documentation including scope statements, project timeline, risk mitigation plans, issue logs, status and cost reports to be presented to internal and external stakeholders.

positions.subtitle: A.P. Moller - Maersk
positions.description: * Translate high-level business requirements into detailed technical specs, and aggressively unblock the engineer teams to execute fast* Define a thoughtful, detailed, and executable rollout strategy for new features, releases, and products.* Write business cases, perform ROIs, and prioritize and write user stories; partner with product development team to break things down and plan them into releases.* Measure the performance of product launches and iterate to success* Focus on building value for our business, not just features; develop innovative and unique product offerings by leveraging knowledge of the key market challenges that already exist in competitor products.* Facilitate cross-functional communication and decision-making, while also developing key stakeholder relationships in various locations.
positions.title: Product Manager - Transport Management Systems
positions.description_html:
* Translate high-level business requirements into detailed technical specs, and aggressively unblock the engineer teams to execute fast
* Define a thoughtful, detailed, and executable rollout strategy for new features, releases, and products.
* Write business cases, perform ROIs, and prioritize and write user stories; partner with product development team to break things down and plan them into releases.
* Measure the performance of product launches and iterate to success
* Focus on building value for our business, not just features; develop innovative and unique product offerings by leveraging knowledge of the key market challenges that already exist in competitor products.
* Facilitate cross-functional communication and decision-making, while also developing key stakeholder relationships in various locations.

positions.subtitle: A.P. Moller - Maersk
positions.description: â€¢ Lead Inland Operations Execution on a pan-India basis for Retail, Automotive and FMCG Key Clients of MAERSK. â€¢ Manage end to end logistics chain within India for cargo originating & destined from North India ICDâ€™s.â€¢ Responsible for adherence to all defined operations processes at all responsible locations & Comply with regulations in place.â€¢ Carried out process audits to verify integrity of processes & implement improvements to avoid any loss of revenue or reduce cost.â€¢ Responsible for management & assessment of vendor as per agreed SLAs.â€¢ Responsible for daily Intermodal, Equipment and Inland Container Terminal operations execution.â€¢ Responsible for ensuring that first mile / last mile trucking, vessel connections for carrier haul customers are completed as per the transport plan.â€¢ Managed connection of cargo to destined service, avoiding/ managing service failures & minimizing claims & liabilities. With special focus on key clients.â€¢ Responsible for maintaining requisite empty inventory at responsible locations to maximize exports & work in tandem with cross functions to increase equipment match back, reduce positioning cost.â€¢ Responsible for Smart ops saving.â€¢ Responsible for ensuring that equipment does not stay as longstandingâ€¢ Established good relations with rail operators, internal & external stake holders, actively contributing & learning from best practices
positions.title: Inland Operations Associate
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Lead Inland Operations Execution on a pan-India basis for Retail, Automotive and FMCG Key Clients of MAERSK.
â€¢ Manage end to end logistics chain within India for cargo originating & destined from North India ICDâ€™s.
â€¢ Responsible for adherence to all defined operations processes at all responsible locations & Comply with regulations in place.
â€¢ Carried out process audits to verify integrity of processes & implement improvements to avoid any loss of revenue or reduce cost.
â€¢ Responsible for management & assessment of vendor as per agreed SLAs.
â€¢ Responsible for daily Intermodal, Equipment and Inland Container Terminal operations execution.
â€¢ Responsible for ensuring that first mile / last mile trucking, vessel connections for carrier haul customers are completed as per the transport plan.
â€¢ Managed connection of cargo to destined service, avoiding/ managing service failures & minimizing claims & liabilities. With special focus on key clients.
â€¢ Responsible for maintaining requisite empty inventory at responsible locations to maximize exports & work in tandem with cross functions to increase equipment match back, reduce positioning cost.
â€¢ Responsible for Smart ops saving.
â€¢ Responsible for ensuring that equipment does not stay as longstanding
â€¢ Established good relations with rail operators, internal & external stake holders, actively contributing & learning from best practices
